name: planning-poker-serverless
description: Cost-optimized Planning Poker with pure serverless architecture (80-90% AWS cost savings)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run db:local" "serverless offline start" "npm run client:dev"

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.cost:monitor: aws ce get-cost-and-usage --time-period Start=2024-01-01,End=2024-12-31 --granularity MONTHLY --metrics BlendedCost
